column5: Does anybody know if there are any places a guy can park a truck type rig for few days on Lac Seul??
most of the lodges around ear falls have campgrounds for rent.
I know Goose Bay has ammenities for campers.
Soo does White Wing and Gold Pines
I think golden fawn (near ear falls) has hook-ups for trailers also.
1 888 LAC SEUL ( 522 7385) hook up for campers or trailers.
